QueryList.Query: FROM HouseSteward A WHERE 1=1 <#if id??> <#if like??> and A.id=%:id% #else> and A.id=:id </#if> </#if> <#if steward??> <#if like??> and A.steward=%:steward% #else> and A.steward=:steward </#if> </#if> <#if house??> <#if like??> and A.house=%:house% #else> and A.house=:house </#if> </#if>
